Jersey_City.Westfield World Trade Center:
Westfield World Trade Center is a shopping center at the World Trade Center complex in Manhattan, New York, that is operated and managed by Westfield Corporation. The mall opened on August 16, 2016 as the largest shopping complex in Manhattan.


== Original mall (1975–2001) ==

The Mall at the World Trade Center was an indoor underground shopping mall that was located in the concourse area of the original World Trade Center complex.
